author: Anonymous
content:
but isn´t that the beautiful thing on these photoblog´s? that they have a special meaning to the artist posting and another one to the one watching it. the artist has the free choice if he just wants to post pictures and leave them for free interpretation or if he wants to explain the whole story of the photo or give also some insights to his life. i really love those artists who always let my imagination flow...who make me daydreaming for some time and leave me so much space for my own interpretation and associations...even when the meaning for me is totally different then it is for them...
on the other hand it is quite interesting to get an insight to the thoughts of the photographer and his daily life...it kills the free interpretation but offers loads of other interesing aspects...so there´s just another source of inspiration that can be taken out of it...

art is free with or without given or free interpretation, viewing arts also...and that´s what makes it unique to the artist and the art over...

Sue
